name: 廖義田
objective:
本課程主要介紹1.新型的高分子合成方法，2.各類高科技高分子材料之合成探討。They are divided in four parts;
{1} kinetics of polymerizations
{2}synthesis of conjuate polymer
{3}synthesis of nanopolymer
{4}synthesis of CNT and  graphenes
applications in high technology and optic-electronic polymers
schedule:
1-4, kinetics
5-8,  synthis of polymer for wide-view angle LCD display
9-12, nanopolymer
13-16, CNT and  graphene
final
materials:
princile of polymer chemistry
by flory
